name: The Kildare Hotel, Spa & Country Club

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed overnight thanks to an "offer" - great value. Room was great, dinner beautiful and the ambience was superb.
reviews.title: Great Value stay

reviews.text: Only one downside was the breakfast, service was confused and took too long to sort - even with a member of staff apologising for a mistake she didn't make!! otherwise good.
reviews.title: Inattentive doorman

reviews.text: Well worth it, especially on a "voucher"!
reviews.title: Worth every penny!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Family break in mid winter is always hit and miss. Parking in the wind and rain with 3 kids in tow is never fun. The door man was disinterested and I had to struggle in with bags and kids etc. The rest of the staff were amazing. They were attentive but not pretentious. Kids club was great and the breakfasts great- although they should just put whats available on the menu and not have to ask for eggs etc. ( I don't think people are comfortable asking for something that might be extra etc- tycoons might be used to chefs preparing anything for their whims but the rest of us need to know whats on offer!)
reviews.title: Love the open fires..

reviews.text: Dinner at the river rest was excellent.
reviews.title: Landed gentry (for a few days anyway)

reviews.text: We had a really enjoyable 2 night break over Halloween with the kids (aged 4, 8 & 12) in the K Club. They absolutely *loved* the kids club which was excellent in every way - which gave us plenty of time to enjoy the grounds and the property itself. The accommodation, staff and overall experience were five star. Of particular note are the reception staff who are exceptionally warm, welcoming and friendly.
reviews.title: Lovely location for Halloween break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only slight blot on the copybook was that breakfast was not up to the standard of the rest of the experience. They have a menu from which you can order things like Eggs Benedict but they don't willingly offer it to you.... and when I asked for it, I had the distinct sense that I was being awkward. I tried to think of another experience where a restaurant has a menu that you have to explicitly ask for but I couldn't!
reviews.title: Fantastic service in picturesque surroundings

reviews.text: However, this was a pretty minor point - we had a lovely time and will certainly return and I'd happily recommend it to friends and family without hesitation.
reviews.title: Brillant family party night

reviews.text: The K club hotel is superb, on arrival we were dealt with very quickly by super friendly staff, we had dinner in the River room and the food was excellent,
reviews.title: Expensive but great service

reviews.text: Breakfast is nothing short of fantastic, the food is really very very good and the staff are extremely attentive.
reviews.title: Golf & Restaurant Experience

reviews.text: This was my third time staying at the K Club. I absolutely love it there and will be going back again in February. Visually, the place is stunning and decorated beautifully. In my opinion, the best thing about the K Club is the staff. All the staff are lovely; they are very welcoming and make you feel very special. Everyone there cannot do enough for you.
reviews.title: It gets better every time I go back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I went to the K Club for a one night stay with my mum. We were put in a superior room on the ground floor in the hotel. Although the room was on the ground floor near the reception and the bar, you couldn't hear anything once the bedroom door was closed. Our bedroom was beautiful and had a lot of lovely little extras; my favourite was the orange chocolate cookies.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel in a lovely location- just needs a few improvements

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On the day we arrived we had lunch. The portion sizes were very generous and reasonably priced. After lunch, my mum and I went to the spa. The spa there is wonderful and very relaxing. The changing rooms are clean and quite spacious. Their therapists are extremely talented, I couldn't praise them enough. I would highly recommend visiting the spa if you are going to stay in the hotel.
reviews.title: Really lovely time.
Amazing
reviews.text: Dinner that night in the River Room restaurant certainly did not disappoint. The chef is clearly very talented; we were served food that looked like a work of art on the plate and which was more importantly delicious. The staff in the restaurant were very attentive without being intrusive. It was 5 star service. The wine list is varied and extensive. As my mum wasn't drinking I ordered a few glasses of their house white which I would highly recommend.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am looking forward to returning there. I cannot recommend this place enough. The place can be expensive, but it is well worth it, especially if you are treating a loved one.
reviews.title: Some bits no so Klassy

reviews.text: This hotel has a proper country club feel to it. A big formal house surrounded by an impressive golf club. Our room was just fantastic. The staff were very warm and friendly. We were there on a deal which included €60 off your dinner. My advice would be just eat in the bar. Even with the voucher your bill will come to over €100.
reviews.title: Highs and lows. Overall a great stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was slow and not what I would have expected from a hotel of this calibre.
reviews.title: Suprise Engagement

reviews.text: At the end of our break I didn't want to go. Now that says more than any stars a hotel has on it's listing.
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The K-Club,
reviews.title: Outstanding Staff at an Outstanding Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Where does one start with all the compliments surrounding the staff and this gorgeous 5 Star hotel.I would like to say its the nicest hotel in Ireland that i have stayed in so far.I proposed here at the K-Club, i had told the receptionist (Sinead) that i was going to the garden to pop the question and she could not have been more helpfull.
reviews.title: World Class experience
